by.tc.auction.service.lot_operation.realization

Class LotOperationServiceImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • by.tc.auction.service.lot_operation.realization.LotOperationServiceImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LotOperationService

    public class LotOperationServiceImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements LotOperationService
    A class is used to provide methods for working with lots on an application logic level and in a database.
    Author:
    semenovich

    • Method Detail

      • createLot

        public boolean createLot(Lot lot)
                  throws ServiceException,
                         LotInfoException
        Creates a lot in a database if lot info is correct.
        A lot name must be not empty.
        A lot description must be not empty.
        A lot quantity must be more than 0.
        Specified by:
        createLot in interface LotOperationService
        Parameters:
        lot - - a lot which will be created.
        Returns:
        true - if a lot has been created. false - if a lot hasn't been created.
        Throws:
        ServiceException - - if an error occurred during operation in a database.
        LotInfoException - - if lot info is incorrect.

      • getLotInfo

        public Lot getLotInfo(java.lang.Integer lotId)
               throws ServiceException
        Returns a lot info from a database.
        Specified by:
        getLotInfo in interface LotOperationService
        Parameters:
        lotId - - a lot ID.
        Returns:
        A lot if a lot exists. null if a lot doesn't exist.
        Throws:
        ServiceException - - if an error occurred during operation in a database.

      • deleteWaitingLot

        public boolean deleteWaitingLot(java.lang.Integer lotId)
                         throws ServiceException
        Removes a waiting lot from a database. In the method the same DAO method should be used.
        Specified by:
        deleteWaitingLot in interface LotOperationService
        Parameters:
        lotId - - a lot ID.
        Returns:
        true - if a lot has been removed. false - if a lot hasn't been removed.
        Throws:
        ServiceException - - if an error occurred during operation in a database.

      • editWaitingLot

        public boolean editWaitingLot(Lot lot)
                       throws ServiceException,
                              LotInfoException
        Edits a waiting lot in a database if lot info is correct.
        A lot name must be not empty.
        A lot description must be not empty.
        A lot quantity must be more than 0.
        Specified by:
        editWaitingLot in interface LotOperationService
        Parameters:
        lot - - updated lot info.
        Returns:
        true - if a lot has been edited. false - if a lot hasn't been edited.
        Throws:
        ServiceException - - if an error occurred during operation in a database.
        LotInfoException - - if lot info is incorrect.

      • getLotsList

        public LotsInfo getLotsList(Locale locale,
                            int page)
                     throws ServiceException
        Returns lots portion list from a database.
        Specified by:
        getLotsList in interface LotOperationService
        Parameters:
        locale - - a locale of lots.
        page - - a page of a lots list.
        Returns:
        A list of lots 10(≤ if lots in portion are less than 10) if lots exist. Empty list if lots don't exist.
        Throws:
        ServiceException - - if an error occurred during operation in a database.

      • getLotsBySearching

        public LotsInfo getLotsBySearching(java.lang.String searchLine,
                                   Locale locale,
                                   int page)
                            throws ServiceException
        Returns a list of lots portion by matching a name of a lots from a database.
        Specified by:
        getLotsBySearching in interface LotOperationService
        Parameters:
        searchLine - - a search line which will be matched with a lots name.
        locale - - a locale of lots.
        page - - a page of a lots list.
        Returns:
        A list of lots 10(≤ if lots in portion are less than 10) if such lots exist. Empty list if such lots don't exist.
        Throws:
        ServiceException - - if an error occurred during operation in a database.
